relation: Darrow4 - #24 Unable to fully control his power yet, Poo arrives a bit quicker than expected. Though the Master often scolded Poo for misusing his strength, this time it is to be expected.
Darrow4 - #23 Overjoyed at having passed his trial, and more importantly having realized he didn't lose his body, Poo sets off for the palace.

Darrow4 - #22 With his mind broken down, the spirit possesses Poo and awakens his inner self. Although the possession is brief, it is enough to set fire to Poo's inner desire to protect. His true self is revealed, and he is deemed worthy as a future ruler of Dalaam.

Darrow4 - #21 Poo's mind begins to grasp hints of his inner voice, as he struggles to not become lost in the darkness. The spirit, wishing to take Poo's mind, has opened the door to what lies underneath all of the thoughts within him. All must become nothingness so that the true voice can be heard.
Darrow4 - #20 With the loss of his eyes, Poo is thrown into darkness. The darkness becomes nothingness, which becomes what Poo wanted from the start. At least, he has arrived at Mu.
